definitions.definition: a word , such as a definite article or demonstrative pronoun , that defines or limits something
an ordinary postage stamp that is part of a series of all denominations or is reprinted as needed to meet demand

main_definition: ( grammar ) a word , such as a definite article or demonstrative pronoun , that defines or limits something
secondary_definitions: ( philately ) an ordinary postage stamp that is part of a series of all denominations or is reprinted as needed to meet demand
